text:
When I entered into
this 2 + 2 program,

it significantly changed my
trajectory within my career,

and allotted me even better
opportunities after I come out
of HBS.

2 + 2 really allowed
me the opportunity

be more thoughtful of
how I kind of wanted
to plan my early career.

I felt like I could really
pursue all of my passions.

For things like start ups,
things like not for profit.

Well, it allowed me to take
the risk of quitting my job
and moving back to India.

And I actually founded a
co-working space in India.

Now I can push
myself to the extreme
and I can still stumble.
That's fine.

The amazing thing
about 2 + 2 is that you

get in at a very early
time in your career.

We're a little bit
on the younger side.
And that can be intimidating.

When you come here,
most people don't even

know that you're
a 2 + 2 student.
You work hard.

You put in the time, just
continue doing what you do best
and you'll be successful here.
